metadata.Description: Well organized and easy to understand Web building tutorials with lots of examples of how to use HTML, CSS, JavaScript, SQL, Python, PHP, Bootstrap, Java, XML and more.
metadata.og:description: W3Schools offers free online tutorials, references and exercises in all the major languages of the web. Covering popular subjects like HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Python, SQL, Java, and many, many more.

content.text: HTML Styles
The HTML style attribute is used to add styles to an element, such as color, font, size, and more.
content.html: The HTML style attribute is used to add styles to an element, such as color, font, size, and more.

content.code: Example I am Red I am Blue I am Big Try it Yourself »

content.text: The HTML Style Attribute
Setting the style of an HTML element, can be done with the style attribute.
content.html: Setting the style of an HTML element, can be done with the style attribute.

content.text: The HTML style attribute has the following syntax:
content.html: The HTML style attribute has the following syntax:

content.code_html: <tagname style="property:value;">

content.text: The property is a CSS property. The value is a CSS value.
content.html: The property is a CSS property. The value is a CSS value.

content.text: You will learn more about CSS later in this tutorial.
content.html: You will learn more about CSS later in this tutorial.

content.text: Background Color
The CSS background-color property defines the background color for an HTML element.
content.html: The CSS background-color property defines the background color for an HTML element.

content.code:
This is a heading

This is a paragraph.
content.code_html:
<body style="background-color:powderblue;">

<h1>This is a heading</h1>
<p>This is a paragraph.</p>

</body>

content.code:
This is a heading

This is a paragraph.
content.code_html:
<body>

<h1 style="background-color:powderblue;">This is a heading</h1>
<p style="background-color:tomato;">This is a paragraph.</p>

</body>

content.text: Text Color
The CSS color property defines the text color for an HTML element:
content.html: The CSS color property defines the text color for an HTML element:

content.code:
This is a heading

This is a paragraph.
content.code_html:
<h1 style="color:blue;">This is a heading</h1>
<p style="color:red;">This is a paragraph.</p>

content.text: Fonts
The CSS font-family property defines the font to be used for an HTML element:
content.html: The CSS font-family property defines the font to be used for an HTML element:

content.code:
This is a heading

This is a paragraph.
content.code_html:
<h1 style="font-family:verdana;">This is a heading</h1>
<p style="font-family:courier;">This is a paragraph.</p>

content.text: Text Size
The CSS font-size property defines the text size for an HTML element:
content.html: The CSS font-size property defines the text size for an HTML element:

content.code:
This is a heading

This is a paragraph.
content.code_html:
<h1 style="font-size:300%;">This is a heading</h1>
<p style="font-size:160%;">This is a paragraph.</p>

content.text: Text Alignment
The CSS text-align property defines the horizontal text alignment for an HTML element:
content.html: The CSS text-align property defines the horizontal text alignment for an HTML element:

content.code_html:
<h1 style="text-align:center;">Centered Heading</h1>
<p style="text-align:center;">Centered paragraph.</p>
